title: Bronze Tier List :^)
body:
Hi, I wanted to post something that may be controversial and that I would like to see discussed. So here it is, my Bronze Tier list (purely opinionated). Also note that I view the divisions as if most people are sitting on 20-30 lp, and not over 80, like seriously I'm the only person in my division up for promos, or even close to them.

5 - Trolls and bad players. If people say they are too good for Bronze 5, I don't believe them.
4 - Bronze 5s climbing up.
3/2 - I feel like Bronze 3 and 2 are players that are actually decent at the game (not so much 3), or are climbing up from lower divisions.
1 - I feel like Bronze 1 players are worse than 3/2, I think that Bronze 1 is for demoted players, much like myself in season 4 (however I am climbing pretty well right now)

Bonus: 
Silver 5 - Most are equal to Bronze 1 (let's be real)

I look forward to comments.

replies.body:
from my experience of playing with lots of different people

if you're(after 100 ranked game)

stuck in bronze, 
you still don't understand how to play the game properly

stuck in silver,
your trading skill is sub par, takes too much free damage

stuck in gold
you don't understand the importance of objectives

stuck in plat
your mechanic/decision making just don't measure up to diamond player, and have  "god complex" which leads to trolling

only been to plat 1 so far, can't say anything about diamond player at this stage, until i get there
In my opinion, 100 in bronze is pretty strange, if you haven't at least ranked up divisions once.i

there are ppl who play lol not just a few games but as an addiction and play hours on end, i believe this ends up making your performance alot worse as in no sleep etc... and constant playing will affect you dramatically. i look at these ppls histories and most of them have like 10+matches from the same day,

yeah, i only play 3 ~4 game max per day, really improve my overall gameplay + enjoy-ability of the game :D leads to less raging too

people underestimate the power of "rest"
I always thought Bronze 5 people should be a separate rank. Its a special kind of person in there. Like junglers with 6 cs at 20 and never ever do their blue buff because "i dont need mana" LOL

What I have been seeing in the league community and social networks are players that are very enthusiastic to play their ranked games after being level 30. Sometimes the risk in playing ranked games are the expectations that they have on any other person within their game. It's a bizarre thought of mine but the mainly the knowledge of every individual player isn't enough and there are always cliche guides in telling them to "not die" and always "ward" etc.  

I can agree with you in terms of divisions from your perspective from lower divisions (4-5) mid to high divisions (3-1) that are judged by many players who are climbing the ranks in solo q. :>

OK here's mine- my highest is gold 5- but at that stage i was still climbing steadily.
 (ALL IN THEIR HEAD, THIS IS WHAT THEY'RE THINKING)
Bronze 5- absolutely brand new to the game. The most they can do is unknowingly pick a strong laning champ and keep pushing you with it
Bronze 4- same thing but wants to climb
Bronze 3- they think they'll never reach silver
Bronze 2- it's everyone's fault that they're bronze
Bronze 1- they're better than everyone above them even up to gold
Silver 5- Gold worthy and able to get gold but eh, too good right now
Silver 4- This is where most golds are right now after the reset.
Silver 3- good but is lacking one or two things to know about the game
Silver 2- climbing to gold
Silver 1- trolls and afks (you will drop and climb at least 5 times before you win promos) until u get a lucky run and get human players instead of bots
